subSections.title: Han character
subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=79|rad=殳|as=12|sn=16|canj=GESHR|four=|ids=⿱殸召}}

# (same as [[韶]]) the name of the music of the legendary Emperor
# harmonious
# (large seal type [[鞀]] [[婸]]) hand-drum used by pedlars, it is sounded by twirling it backwards in the hand
# so that two swinging knobs can strike the face of the drum
